metadata.title: CVE-2014-7916 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Integer overflow in SampleTable.cpp in libstagefright in Android before5.0.0 has unspecified impact and attack vectors, aka internal bug 15342751.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
